mapper.select: SELECT appinfodb.app_info.id AS id, softwareName, APKName,status,versionId, softwareSize, supportROM, interfaceLanguage, appInfo, logoPicPath, d1.valueName AS flatformName, d2.valueName AS statusName, downloads, a1.categoryName AS categoryLevel1Name, a2.categoryName AS categoryLevel2Name, a3.categoryName AS categoryLevel3Name, versionNo FROM appinfodb.app_info INNER JOIN appinfodb.data_dictionary AS d1 ON d1.valueId = flatformId AND d1.typeCode = 'APP_FLATFORM' INNER JOIN appinfodb.data_dictionary AS d2 ON d2.valueId = STATUS AND d2.typeCode = 'APP_STATUS' INNER JOIN appinfodb.app_category AS a1 ON categoryLevel1 = a1.id INNER JOIN appinfodb.app_category AS a2 ON categoryLevel2 = a2.id INNER JOIN appinfodb.app_category AS a3 ON categoryLevel3 = a3.id WHERE app_info.id=#{id}
